pkgmetadata.longdescription: Time-Dependent Precision-Recall Curve Estimation for Right- Censored Data // This contains functions that can be used to estimate the time-dependent precision-recall curve (PRC) and the corresponding area under the PRC for right-censored survival data. It also compute time-dependent ROC curve and its corresponding area under the ROC curve (AUC). See Beyene, Chen and Kifle (2024) doi:10.1002/bimj.202300135.
